body.p: provides support for browsing and managing Documentum repositories in the Data Source Explorer. You can easily create new resources on the repository, copy and move them using contextual actions or the drag and drop support, edit and transform the documents in the editor. The operations that can be performed on repository resources are described in the actions section.
supports version 6.5 or later with Documentum Foundation Services 6.5 or later installed.

note.p: It is recommended to use the latest 1.6.x Java version. It is possible that the support will not work properly if you use other Java versions.
